All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractClient
The AbstractClient contains all the methods necessary to set up the client side of a client-server architecture.
ActivateSalesController
This class gives the option to Marketing Manger to ask from the Marketing Worker to active one of the sale pattern.
AdaptableClient
The AdaptableClient is a class that extends the AbstractClient in place of the ObservableClient .
Area
public enum Area - Enumeration of possible areas.
AreaDeliveriesOperatorController
Area Deliveries Operator Controller Contains all the functionality to move the employee to the screen required to perform the various actions possible.
AreaManager
AreaManager class is a subclass of the User class and represents an area manager in the system.
AreaManagerController
Area Manager Controller Get All Area Manager Information AreaManagerEntityController instance variable to get area manager details JavaFX controller
AreaManagerEntityController
The AreaManagerEntityController class is a controller class for an AreaManager entity.
CartController
This class is the controller of a small scene that display a single product in cart, when in the checkout screen it displays the photo, name , amount and total price of a single product.
CartProductController
This class is a decorative class for the product view class, it takes the product view class, and adds information and functionality.
CEOController
CEO Controller This class is used to handle the CEO's GUI screen.
ChangeWindow
This class main purpose is to display windows, changeScreen display a regular scene usually called after hide of the previous scene, and showPopup to display a pop up window with the wanted information.
ChatIF
This interface implements the abstract method used to display objects onto the client or server UIs.
CheckoutController
This class display to the user his cart and let him have the option of cancel or confirm the order, also able to press back to MyOrderScreen to continue and edit the order This class makes user of this tables 'productinfacility' or 'product', which contain the product details (for updating inventory according to user selection)
CheckShipmentReportController
 
ClientConnectScreenController
This class is the controller of the client connect screen allow to enter IP of the server you want to connect and a port of the server you want to connect to, when connected transfer to the login screen
ClientConsole
This class implements the chatIF interface, holds a EkrutClient instance and its purpose is to and communicate between the client UI and the EkrutClient,
CommonActionsController
This class implements all the methods that every or a lot of different screens uses, like logout, pressing the X , Back, or Next button in the screen and use of a PopUp window.
CompleteShipmentsConfirmationController
Complete shipments confirmation controller for area deliveries employee to confirm all of the shipment in his area that received by the customer and in status "In Proccess" and change them to "Done" for complete the process.
ConfirmRegistretionRequestController
This class gives the option to Area Manager to see whose the users who registered to his area and waiting to approve.
Country
public enum Country - Enumeration of possible countries.
Customer_ReportEntityController
*The Customer_ReportEntityController class is a controller class for an CustomerReport entity.
CustomerReport
CustomerReport Include data to create Histogram Chart Of Customers The Graph will show 10%,20%.....100% Distbution , Based On Money Customer Spent In Area In specific Month.
CustomerReportController
Customer Report JavaFX controller CustomerReportController instance variable to get report details Include Histogram Chart Of Customers The Graph will show 10%,20%.....100% Distbution , Based On Money Customer Spent In Area In specific Month
CustomerShippmentStatus
Enumeration of possible shipment statuses for a customer's order The possible values of this enumeration are: Received NotRecived
CustomerType
Enumeration of possible types of customers.
DefineThresholdLevelController
This department gives the option to let the area manager change the threshold level of each product in the facility located in the area he is responsible for.
EkrutClient
This class extends the AbstractClient class from the OCSF framework which means this is our client which communicate with our server, the purpose of this class is to maintain connection with the server ,send and receive messages from the server and transferring the information from the UI controllers to the server and back to the UI controllers.
EkrutClientUI
This class extend the javaFx application class to start our javaFX application
ExecutionInstructions
This class is the ExecutionInstructoin entity which hold all the information of the ExcectionInstruction entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'exectioninstruction' table in database
Facility
The Facility class represents a facility that stores products.
FacilityInAreaController
 
ILoginManager
This Interface is to be able to use dependency injection in the testing for login controller class (this interface remove the dependency of the ui elements and the server when use with stub class)
Instruction
Enumeration of possible instruction types for a client-server communication.
Inventory_ReportEntityController
*The Inventory_ReportEntityController class is a controller class for an Inventory_ReportEntityController entity.
InventoryReport
InventoryReport Class to present Inventory Report For Managers
InventoryReportController
JavaFX controller * Inventory_ReportEntityController instance variable to get report details Inventory Report Based On Distribution Of of products in facilities inventory Area Presented as PIE Count Of times passed threshold level for every product in Histogram
LoginController
Login controller for a login GUI.
MakeRegistrationController
This class is used to handle the MakeRegistrationForm's GUI screen.
ManageMyOrderController
Manage my order controller for see details about all user's orders history and confirmation receipt of shipments.
MarketingManagerController
Maketing Manager Controller This class is used to handle the MaketingManager's GUI screen.
MarketingWorkerController
 
MarketingWorkerSalesController
This class gives the option to let a marketing worker active sales that the marketing manager requested to run based on the start date.
MyOrderController
This class gives the user the option to select product he want to buy and adds them to a shopping cart: displaying the total price and enable a get button to move to the checkout screen to confirm and pay for the order.
NoRoleController
This class is used to handle the display of a screen for users who do not have a role.
NotificationController
The NotificationController class is a controller class for displaying notifications in the system.
ObservableClient
This class acts as a subclass of AbstractClient and is also an Observable class.
Observer
Simple interface to implement observer (from the observable design pattern)
OpreatingWorkerController
This page includes the home screen of the operations worker, he can place an order according to the privileges he has or go to the page for updating inventory in the facilities
OpreatingWorkerTableInAreaManger
This class is the OpreatingWorkerTableInAreaManger entity which hold all the information of the OpreatingWorkerTableInAreaManger entity with getters and setters for each attribute, the purpose is to be able to display this information in a table view.
Order
This class is the Order entity which hold all the information of the Order entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'order' table in database
Order_ReportEntityController
*The Order_ReportEntityController class is a controller class for an Order_ReportEntityController entity.
OrderEntityController
General Entity order Controller , Save general information about report
OrderReport
OrderReport Class to present Order Report For Managers
OrderReportController
JavaFX controller * Order_ReportEntityController instance variable to get report details Order Report Based On Distribution Of Facilities by order number in Area Presented as PIE Count Of Orders displayed in Bar Chart - Histogram
OrderTimer
This class uses the timer object and an instance from the StopWatch class to run a the runnable RefreshTimer every second in a thread to be able to keep a timer running without effecting the UI responsiveness, also this class hold an array of observes that way it is used as an observable and update the observers of the current time every second
OrderTimerEntityController
General Entity order Controller , Save a static instance of the OrderTimer
PaymentController
This class display to the user all the details of the order and his personal details, gives the user payments option (credit cart and monthly payment if the he is a subscriber) when the user press pay the order will be saved in the server and a pop up with the order number will dispaly.
PickUpOrderController
 
PopUpController
This class is used to control the behavior of a pop-up window.
ProccessStatus
Enumeration of possible statuses of a supply order process in package Enum.
Product
This class is the Product entity which hold all the information of the Product entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'product' table in database
ProductCartViewController
This class is like a decorator for the product view controller it uses the product view controller as the base and adds the add to cart button and a label shows the amount left in stock .
ProductCategory
Enumeration of possible categories of products.
ProductInFacility
This class is the ProductInFacility entity which hold all the information of the ProductInFacility entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'productinfacility' table in database
ProductInUserOrder
This class is the ProductInUserOrder entity which hold all the information of the ProductInUserOrder entity with getters and setters for each attribute, the purpose is to be able to display this information in a table view.
ProductStatus
Enumeration of possible product's status.
ProductViewController
The ProductViewController class is used to handle the display of product information in the GUI.
RegisteredCustomer
This class is the Registered entity which hold all the information of the Registered entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'RegisteredCusotmer' table in database, extends the User entity (hold all the information of the RegisteredCustomer)
RegisteredCustomerController
This class is used to handle the RegisteredCustomer's GUI screen.
RegistrationFormController
This class is a JavaFX controller class for a registration form GUI to create new registration as registeredCustomer or as a Subscriber for user and add the user all the permissions as registeredCustomer or as a Subscriber.
RegistrationFormController.EmailValidator
A utility class that provides email validation functionality.
RemoteOrderController
This class is responsible for handling the remote order functionality.
Report
This class is the Report entity which hold all the information of the Report entity with getters and setters for each attribute
ReportType
Enumeration of report's type.
Role
Enumeration of possible product's status.
Sale
This class is the Sale entity which hold all the information of the Sale entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'sales' table in database
SalePattern
This class is the SalePattern entity which hold all the information of the SalePattern entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'salepattern' table in database
SalesPatternsController
 
SaleStatus
Enumeration of possible sale's status.
SelfCollection
This class is the SelfCollection entity which hold all the information of the SelfCollection entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'orderselfcollection' table in database extends the Order entity (hold all the information of the Self Collection order)
SelfCollectionDetailsController
The SelfCollectionDetailsController class is a controller class that handles the logic and data of the self collection of the user's remote order.
ServerMessage
Every Communication between client and server will be an object of this class
ServiceRepresentiveEmployeeController
This class is a controller class for the ServiceRepresentiveEmployee FXML file.
Shipment
This class is the Shipment entity which hold all the information of the Shipment entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'ordershipment' table in database extends the Order entity (hold all the information of the Shipment order)
ShipmentDetailsController
The ShipmentDetailsController class is a controller class that handles the logic and data of the shipment of the user's remote order.
ShipmentReportController
JavaFX controller Shipment Report Based On Distribution Of Shipments Count in Area Presented as PIE Profit from shipment in every area displayed in Bar Chart Presented as Histogram
ShipmentsConfirmationController
Shipments confirmation controller for area deliveries employee to confirm all of the shipment in his area that in status "Waiting for confirmation" to start their shipment process.
StopWatch
This class is a simple stop watch , holds a start time and calculate time passed in milliseconds, seconds, minutes;
Subscriber
This class is the Subscriber entity which hold all the information of the Subscrigber entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'Subscriber' table in database, extends the Registered entity which extends the User entity (hold all the information of the Subscriber User)
SubscriberController
This class is used to handle the subscriber's GUI screen.
SupplyMethod
Enumeration of possible supply method.
TransferExecutionInstructionsController
 
UpdateInventoryController
This class gives the option to let the operations worker watch the tasks that are open for him.
User
This class is the User entity which hold all the information of the User entity with getters and setters for each attribute, correspond to the 'user' table in database
UserController
This class is responsible for storing and managing a User object.
UserOrdersEntityController
 
UserStatus
Enumeration of possible user's status.
ViewCatalogController
ViewCatalogController is a JavaFX controller class that handles the user interface of the view catalog screen in the client application.
ViewReportController
View Report Controller Screen for selecting reports, for managers.
ViewUpdatedFacilityInventoryController
This class gives the option to Area Manager to see the inventory of each facility in his area that have not been updated and will still remain open.
WorkerEntityController
This class is responsible for storing and managing a User object for worker and the worker second role.
